title: El Conejo
subtitle: The Rabbit
meta_desc: Learn rabbit vocabulary in Spanish (conejo, salta, orejas, zanahoria) with audio pronunciation and word highlighting. Ages 2-5.
keywords: learn Spanish preschool, Spanish animals book, el conejo Spanish, bilingual children books, Spanish vocabulary kids
